title: Homer Simpson - Software Menu System.iso
description:
This disc is designed for Computer Technicians to use when working on clients computers. It includes only fully cracked or full version software and nothing is a trial version. There is alot of valuable software and it&#039;s all conveniently arranged in a single menu program. Everything is divided into sections and separated by category. This is a must have for people that frequently install or reinstall the same software on a regular basis. 

ALL FILES AND PROGRAMS ARE MULTIPLE-TESTED AND GUARANTEED FREE OF VIRUSES AND SPYWARE.

Software designed primarily for WINDOWS VISTA is marked with a PURPLE icon.
Software designed primarily for WINDOWS XP is marked with a BLUE icon.
Scripts that are RUN as opposed to installing are marked with an ORANGE icon.
Software designed primarily for WINDOWS VISTA is marked with a PURPLE icon.
Cracks for their associated programs are marked with a GREEN icon.
Software updates are marked with a GREEN icon with a globe on it.
Keygens, as opposed to cracks, are marked with an ORANGE KEY icon.

================================================================
